machineModeTypeDes.cn: 设备的液体模式，仅能在拥有【工业开采许可证】的部分地区进行液体开采与加工
machineModeTypeDes.en: The fluid mode of various facilities allows fluid extraction and processing as well as fluid-assisted mining, but can only be used in regions allowed by the [Industrial Mining and Foraging Permit].

machineModeTypeDes.cn: 设备的基础模式，可以在所有地区使用
machineModeTypeDes.en: The standard mode of various facilities can be used in any region.
